text:
April 1st was very eventful for the expecting pair! Princess Love pranked Ray J on April Fools’ Day, and it was epic! Check out his reaction that was caught on camera here.

To mark the first day of April, the woman pretended to go into labor, and she really got her husband good!

Princess Love took to social media to share the video with her followers, and everyone loved the man’s crazy reaction to her water supposedly breaking.

‘Got @RayJ good after his show last night #APRILFOOLS,’ she captioned the post.

The video shows The Love and Hip Hop: Hollywood star in an elevator alongside her hubby and a few friends.

At some point, Princess Love fools Ray J that her water broke and, like any first-time-father-to-be, he freaks out big time.

Even her pals were in on it, as they made sure to spill some water onto the floor to make the whole thing more convincing.

‘Her water just broke,’ they pretended to notice.

‘What does that mean?!’ Ray J asks, obviously panicking.

‘It means the baby is coming!’ someone screams.

Ray J is more and more panicked as he denies: ‘No it doesn’t, no it doesn’t!’

‘Call 911!’ another friend says, but before things could go too far, Princess Love smiles and tells her husband: ‘April Fools!’

Ray J’s face when he realizes it was all a prank is just priceless!

He also took to his own Instagram to write: ‘Man this is cruel to do to anyone lol – they got me hella good @princesslove @brandon_kidd_b @thehutsonian @wayneindisthang. aprilfools #callthepolice #dontbelookingatmywifeswater #waterbroke #hilarious.’

As fans know, the two got married in 2016.

In November of last year, while on The Real, the singer revealed they are pregnant with their first child.

Advertisement

In reality, Princess is supposed to give birth in the summertime.
title: Princess Love Pranks Ray J That Her Water Broke In Epic April Fools’ Day Video! – Check Out His Hilarious Reaction!
